metatab-latest: A list of licensed Residential Elder Care Facilities (RCFEs) from the California Department of Social Services.

column4: Facilties geocoded to localtions, tracts and blocks with the Census geocoder.

column3: CA DSS Care Facilities Home Page
column4: This page has links to search forms and the data download page

column3: CA DSS Page with Link to Dataset
column4: The link is not direct -- it links through Jaascript -- so the data is downloaded into this package.
Notes about the dataset from the wranger.

metatab-latest: The `facilities` file, as downloaded, is severly malformed, with a variable number of columns per row. The extra colums seem to represent a variable number of complain records.  The copy of the file in this package has colums after AK removed.
The two geocoded files were geocoded using sandiego.csv as input, from the Census geocoder lined to https://www.census.gov/geo/maps-data/data/geocoder.html
Version 6. Updates the geocoder to reuse geocodes from the previous version. This assumes that the facilities don't move locations.
Version 7. Updates the geocoder to use the new zip-to-tract procedure for assigning tracts to facilities that failed to geocode.
